tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim: Hearthfire - Official Trailer
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Create a living home With this official add-on to The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, you can purchase land and build your own home from the ground up - from a simple one-room cottage to a sprawling compound complete with an armory, alchemy laboratory, stable, garden, and more. Use all-new tools like the drafting table and carpenter's workbench to transform quarried stone, clay, and sawn logs into structures and furnishings. Even transform your house into a home by adopting children. Hearthfire, the next official game add-on for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, will be available for download for 400 Microsoft Points on Xbox LIVE® on September 4. Read more here [link to Hearthfire Product Page on BethSoft.com].

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: CAN SOMEBODY HELP ME PLEASE!!!!! THERE IS A GLITCH IN THE HEARTHFIRE DLC WHERE ALL THE KIDS ARE WEARING NOTHING BUT THEIR UNDERWEAR!﻿ IDK IF IT'S A BUG OR YOU HAVE T BUY THEM CLOTHES BUT IT REALLY IS ANNOYING!!!!!! IT DOESN'T LOOK RIGHT AT ALL.
EVERYBODY!!! Stop fucking around with the bullshit "Skyrim On PS3 is better﻿ then xbox"!! We all know that skyrim were meant for PC And xbox!
well duh, seeings that all the addons are excluse xbox for a month lol anyone who has ever played all the other games, morrowind and oblivion will know that morrowind was only for xbox and﻿ PC

EDIT: I meant to say, instead of having the game literally take nine in-game months to have your child or children, the in-game time would be ported to nine months later when your child or children have already been born. The in-game time being ported to nine months later would be similar to how the in-game time was ported to years later﻿ at the beginning of the game. So as everyone can clearly see, if Bethesda were to use this solution, having children biologically with your spouse in Skyrim-
i play on ps3.........fuck﻿
its called give them clothes you﻿ pervert
-would not be a big deal﻿ at all.
The only gift i can give my daughter is a soul trap enchanter ebony dagger! Wth.. i have lots of instruments and jewels and the dagger is all﻿ they will let me give her
Bethesda Can easily make ps3 content if they can make mac ccontent﻿
Come on bethes wheres﻿ the dawnguard for the fucking ps3 already. The second dlc is already out wtf!!!!!
yeah a whole﻿ 5 dollars, how will you manage!?
This is such﻿ a fun dlc !!! XBOX FOR THE WIN!
How did you﻿ fix it?
I know you are not a perv, I had the same glitch too, I deleted mine and I'm﻿ re-downloading it to see it that fixes it.
This is going to cost me VERY﻿ much.....
I just did﻿ I fix the problem and I'm not a perv.

@boxdynomite3
And where's﻿ your proof for that?
play station sucks your mothers hairy sticky ballsacks so﻿ stop bickering
omg omg omg omg﻿ omg
DOwnload﻿ BUDDY SLAP iphone ipad game.. is cool and FREE :))

Again I say, why can you only adopt? Many people have been wanting to have their own children in Skyrim. I sure hope Bethesda allows players to have more than one option when it comes to having children in Skyrim. I.E, allowing players to biologically have children with their spouses. Simple solution to this is the following: 1. Beast races cannot have children, only Humands and Elves can. 2. Instead of literally﻿ taking nine in-game months later when your child or children have already been born
not coming﻿ for ps3.. havent you read? they cant coz it wont work

i dont have an xbox i only play on pc but one question﻿ do they have like Daedric furniture, altars or something like that? that would be awsome, but on second thought mod makers might make mods like those.
Is﻿ it only riften orphanage where you can adopt kids
